column2: "Aber a Amazia hyɛɛ ase dɛ oridzi hen no na oedzi mfe eduonu enum; na odzii hen mfe eduonu akron wɔ Jerusalɛm: na ne na ne dzin dze Jehoadan
column3: ofi Jerusalɛm."

column2: "Na ɔyɛɛ dza ɔtsen wɔ EWURADZE enyiwa do
column3: naaso nna ommfi n'akoma mu."

column2: "Afei ɔbaa dɛ
column3: aber a wotsiim ahendzi no maa no no
column4: nna okunkum no nkowaa a wokum n'egya ɔhen no."

column2: "Na hɔn mba dze
column3: woennkuku hɔn
column4: mbom ɔyɛɛ dɛ mbrɛ wɔakyerɛw no mbra no mu wɔ Moses no nwoma no mu
column8: nkyii so mba runnwu wɔ egyanom ntsi; na mbom nyimpa biara bowu wɔ nankasa no bɔn ntsi."

column2: "Nkyii so Amazia poon Juda hyiae
column3: na ɔhyehyɛɛ hɔn dɛ mbrɛ hɔn egyanom efiefi tsetsee
column4: wɔ mpem do asafohemfo na ɔha ɔha do asafohemfo ase
column5: mekyerɛ Juda na Benjamin nyinara: na ɔkaan hɔn fi hɔn a woedzi mfe eduonu na ekyir do
column6: na ohun dɛ wɔyɛ mbarimba a wɔasan mu eyi hɔn mpemahaasa a wotum ɔsa tu a
column7: wobotum esuo peaa na kyɛm mu."

column2: "Eso ɔdze dwetɛ  talent   ɔha bɔɔ Israel mu mbarimba akatakyi a wɔyɛ ndam mpemɔha paa."
"Na Nyame nyimpa bi baa ne nkyɛn
column3: dɛ
column4: Ɔhen
column5: mma mma Israel dɔm no nnye wo nnkɔ; osiandɛ EWURADZE nndzi Israel ekyir

column2: "Na mbom sɛ ɔwoara bɔkɔ a
column3: nna yɛ mbanyindze
column4: na hyɛ dzen wɔ ɔko no mu: ɔno Nyankopɔn bɛma ahwe ase wɔ atamfo no enyim; osiandɛ Nyankopɔn wɔ tum a ɔdze bɔboa
column5: na ɔdze bɛma obi ahwe ase."

column2: "Na Amazia see Nyame nyimpa no dɛ
column3: Na  talent   ɔha a medze mama Israel dɔm no yɛnyɛ no dɛn? Na Nyame nyimpa no buaa dɛ
column4: EWURADZE yɛ otumfo dɛ ɔbɛma wo dza ɔdɔɔ so sen iyi."

column2: "Nna Amazia yiyii hɔn
column3: ɔnye dɛ
column4: oyii dɔm a wofi Efraim baa ne nkyɛn no
column5: dɛ wɔnsan nkɔ fie: dɛm ntsi hɔn ebufuw dzɛɛw kɛsenara wɔ Juda do
column6: na wɔsanee kɔr fie wɔ ebufuhyew mu."

column2: "Na Amazia nyaa akokodur
column3: na ɔdze no nkorɔfo no sii mu kɔr Nkyen Bɔnsa no mu
column4: na okokum Seirmba no mu nyimpa mpemdu."

column2: "Na Judamba no faa hɔn mu mpemdu so enyikan kɔree
column3: na wɔdze hɔn baa ɔbotan no etsifi
column4: na wɔtotoow hɔn fi ɔbotan no n'etsifi hwehwee famu
column5: ma hɔn nyinara hɔn mu tsetseew esinesin."

column2: "Na dɔm no mu nyimpa no a Amazia maa wɔsanee
column3: dɛ mma mma wɔnnye no nkɔ ɔsa no
column4: kotui hyɛɛ Juda nkurow do
column5: dze fi Samaria araa kodur Bɛt-horon
column6: na wokunkum hɔn mu nyimpa mpensa na wɔfaa asadze piigyan."

column2: "Afei ɔbaa dɛ
column3: n'ekyir no a Amazia fi Edomfo nkumii no bae no
column4: nna ɔdze Seirmba enyame bae
column5: na ɔdze hɔn besisii hɔ dɛ wɔnyɛ n'enyame
column6: na ɔbɔɔ no mu adze wɔ hɔn enyim

column2: "Dɛm ntsi EWURADZE n'ebufuw dzɛwee wɔ Amazia do
column3: na ɔsomaa nkɔnhyɛnyi ma ɔbaa ne nkyɛn a ɔbɛsee no dɛ
column4: Ɔyɛ dɛn ntsi na ahwehwɛ ɔman bi enyame a woenntum ennyi hɔnankasa hɔn man emmfi wo nsamu no ekyir kwan yi?"

column2: "Na ɔbaa dɛ
column3: aber a ɔnye no rekasa no nna ɔhen no see no dɛ
column4: Ana yɛahyɛ wo ɔhen n'apamfo bi a? Gyaa; ɔyɛ dɛn ntsi na woboku wo? Nna nkɔnhyɛnyi no gyae
column6: Muhu dɛ Nyankopɔn esua dɛ ɔbɛsɛɛ wo
column7: osiandɛ ɔwo ayɛ adze a ɔtse dɛm

column2: "Nna Judahen Amazia gyee apam
column3: na ɔsomae ma wɔkɔr Israelhen Joas
column4: Jehoahaz ne ba no

column3: dɛ

column6: Fa wo babaa ma me babanyin ayewar: na abowa bɔyafo bi a ɔwɔ Lebanon do botwaa mu

column2: "Ɔwo ese dɛ
column3: Hwɛ
column4: ɔwoara eku Edom; na w'akoma ama wo do dɛ irutwa mpoa: afei tsena fie; ɔyɛ dɛn ntsi na edze woho rebɛgyegye mu ama wo mbusu

column2: "Na Amazia enntsie; osiandɛ ofi Nyankopɔn hɔ
column3: ama oeeyi hɔn ahyɛ hɔn atamfo nsa
column4: osiandɛ
column5: wɔahwehwɛ Edom enyame no n'ekyir kwan."

column2: "Nna Israelhen Joas sii mu kɔree; na ɔno na Judahen Amazia wodzii enyimhu wɔ Bɛt-semes a ɔyɛ Juda dze no."
"Na wɔbɔɔ Juda gui wɔ Israel enyim; na woguanguanee
column3: nyimpa biara kɔr n'asesee mu."

column2: "Na Israelhen Joas kyeer Judahen Amazia
column3: Jehoahaz ba Joas ba no
column4: wɔ Bɛt-semes
column6: na obobubuu Jerusalɛm fasu no fi Efraim kuropon ho dze kodur kutuwdo kuropon no ho

column4: na ɔhen no ne fie akoradze no
column5: na no dɔm no so bi

column2: "Na Judahen Amazia
column3: Joas ba no dzii mfe duenum wɔ Israelhen Joas
column4: Jehoahaz ne ba no

column2: "Afei Amazia no ho nsɛm nkaa no
column3: kan dze na ekyir dze no
column4: ana wɔnnkyerɛɛw no wɔ Juda na Israel ahemfo nwoma no mu?"

column2: "Afei ofitsi mber a Amazia sanee fii EWURADZE ekyir dzi no
column3: nna wɔpaam ne tsir do wɔ Jerusalɛm; na oguanee kɔr Lakis: na wɔsomae ma wotsiiw no kɔr Lakis
column4: na wokokum no wɔ hɔ."

column2: "Na wɔdze no too mpɔnkɔ do bae
column3: na wosiee no kaa n'egyanom ho wɔ Juda kurow no mu."
